name: Cast Away: The Oddysee
storyline: John Maynard, a helmsman and member of Captain Hawkins' crew, finds himself stranded on an island after their ship is suddenly attacked. Alone and isolated, he quickly realizes that mysterious events are unfolding on the island. During his explorations, he encounters numerous skeletons and monsters. Before long, he learns about the Demon King, who resides on the island with ambitions of world domination. In order to escape the island, John sees his only option is to join the resistance and defeat the Demon King.
summary: "Cast Away - The Oddysee" is an RPG Maker XP game developed by TheLuigiplayer and LamaZ Game Studio (formerly JS RPG's), which has been in development since 2011. The game is based on the concept of a classic dungeon crawler and follows the story of the sailor "John Maynard," who is named after the ballad by Theodor Fontane. John finds himself stranded on what initially appears to be a deserted island. However, events soon start to unfold, revealing what mysterious occurrences are taking place on that island!
